Scenario: Identity compromise via phishing leads to unauthorized access to cloud resources and sensitive data
Primary_Controls: MFA enforcement; Conditional Access; Sign-in monitoring; Phishing training

Scenario: Excessive privileges via RBAC due to poorly scoped group memberships and lack of reviews
Primary_Controls: Periodic access reviews; Least privilege RBAC via groups; Role definitions

Scenario: Unauthorized users gain access via misconfigured VPN/remote access services and bypass controls
Assets: VPN access infrastructure + Remote access services
Primary_Controls: Secure configuration baselines; MFA for VPN; Remote access logging/alerting

Scenario: Endpoint loss or compromise exposes sensitive data due to inadequate protection
Primary_Controls: Full disk encryption; Intune compliance policies; Lost device reporting process

Scenario: Accidental disclosure of PHI/PII through collaboration channels without adequate safeguards
Primary_Controls: DLP policies; Restricted access; Audit logging; Data classification/handling

Scenario: Third-party vendor incident exposes PHI/PII with limited internal control over vendor operations
Primary_Controls: Contractual security requirements; Vendor access monitoring; Periodic vendor risk assessments
